Package com.ae2dms.Controllers

Class SlotController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.Controllers.SlotController
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileHandler
public class SlotController
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileHandler

The Class SlotController is the controller class of slot.fxml. Initialize the slot scene, define some mouse events and set the text property of buttons.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/18-9:48

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the slot scene, set the Buttons' text.

      initialize the the slot scene, using FileHandler interface mapSetName method to set the button text property.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/22-13:56

    • openSlot1

      public void openSlot1​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the Archive1.skb game.

      If gameName equal to "New Game!", call the starGame method and play the start interface sound. else, use Archive1.skb to load the game map.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Mouse click.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws IOException
      date
      2020/11/18-10:44

    • eraseSlot

      public void eraseSlot​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Mouse event method, click the button set the scene to erase scene.

      Jump to the erase slot scene and play the interface sound.

      public void returnToMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException

    • StarGame

      public void StarGame() throws java.io.IOException
      Prompt a input dialog and set the scene to game scene.

      Prompt a input dialog that allows user to input Nickname for game and initialize the game. If user cancel the dialog, jump to the slot scene.

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/29-18:18
